basic_information.scholarship_name: Kay and Harold Jackson Endowed Scholarship for Business
basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Kay and Harold Jackson Endowed Scholarship for Business is open to declared business majors who are enrolled full-time. Students must have a minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA and have completed at least 30 hours at UCO at the time of application. Transfer students excluded. Eligibility Requirements Declared business majors Enrolled full-time Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher Completed at least 30 hours at UCO Transfer students excluded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
